lead_paragraph: Arthur Goldman is a Jewish businessmen who lives in Manhattan. In 1965, a group of Israeli underground agents burst into Goldman's office, kidnap him, and he is taken to Israel. Once there, Goldman is placed in a bulletproof glass booth and and put on trial, accused of masquerading as a Jew to disguise the fact that he was a notorious Nazi war criminal.
